trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the user making the page request.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon om brukeren forespørselen siden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object represents the security context of the user on whose behalf the code is running, including that user's identity and any roles to which they belong.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet representerer sikkerhetskonteksten for brukeren på vegne koden kjører, inkludert brukerens identitet og alle roller de tilhører.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: This property uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object's <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property to determine where the request originates.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen bruker den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>objektets <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>til å fastslå som forespurte.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> that represents the user making the page request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>som representerer bruker gjør nettsiden.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Instructs any validation controls included on the page to validate their assigned information.
trans-unit.target: Angir at validering Kontroller inkluderes på siden for å validere informasjonen om tilordnet.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked when a user clicks any ASP.NET server control that has the `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiveres når brukeren klikker en ASP.NET-serverkontroll som har den `CausesValidation` -egenskapen satt til `true`, som er standard.

trans-unit.source: These include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> Web server controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> HTML server controls, and controls that can automatically post back to the server such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> controls.
trans-unit.target: Disse omfatter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>Web-serverkontroller den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>HTML serverkontroller og kontroller kan automatisk legge inn på serveren som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: To disable validation for any button control on the page, set the button control's `CausesValidation` property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere validering for alle knappekontrollen på siden, setter du knappen kontrollens `CausesValidation` egenskapen `false`.

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it iterates through the validation controls contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection> object associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and invokes the validation logic for each validation control in the current validation group.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden startes, den går gjennom validering kontrollene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection>tilknyttet den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen og aktiverer validering logikken for hver validering kontroll i den gjeldende valideringsgruppen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The validation group is determined by the control that posted the page to the server.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsgruppen er avhengig av kontrollen som posteres siden til serveren.

trans-unit.source: If no validation group is specified, then no validation group is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen valideringsgruppe er angitt, brukes ingen valideringsgruppe.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The behavior of page validation has changed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Virkemåten for siden validering er endret.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/add/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], controls no longer call the Validate method; they use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method instead.
trans-unit.target: I [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/add/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], kontroller lenger kalle metoden Valider; de bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you use the Validate method on an [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/add/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] page, validation groups are ignored and all controls are validated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker metoden Valider på en [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/add/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] siden valideringsgrupper blir ignorert og alle kontrollene er godkjent.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the validation controls in the specified validation group to validate their assigned information.
trans-unit.target: Angir at validering kontrollene i den angitte valideringsgruppen til å validere sine tilordnede informasjon.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked when a user clicks any ASP.NET server control that has the `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiveres når brukeren klikker en ASP.NET-serverkontroll som har den `CausesValidation` -egenskapen satt til `true`, som er standard.

trans-unit.source: These include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> Web server controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> HTML server controls, and controls that can automatically post back to the server such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> controls.
trans-unit.target: Disse omfatter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>Web-serverkontroller den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>HTML serverkontroller og kontroller kan automatisk legge inn på serveren som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: To disable validation for any button control on the page, set the button control's `CausesValidation` property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere validering for alle knappekontrollen på siden, setter du knappen kontrollens `CausesValidation` egenskapen `false`.

trans-unit.source: The Validate method validates the specified validation group.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Valider validerer valideringsgruppen angitt.

trans-unit.source: After calling the Validate method on a validation group, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A> method will return `true` only if both the specified validation group and the validation group of the control that caused the page to be posted to the server are valid.
trans-unit.target: Etter kaller Valider-metode på en valideringsgruppe av <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A>-metoden `true` bare hvis både valideringsgruppen angitt og valideringsgruppen av kontrollen som forårsaket siden posteres til serveren er ugyldig.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The validation group name of the controls to validate.
trans-unit.target: Gruppenavnet validering av kontroller for å bekrefte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the page checks client input from the browser for potentially dangerous values.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om siden sjekker klienten inndata fra nettleseren for potensielt skadelige verdier.

trans-unit.source: The value <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode> is not used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class because there is nothing to inherit from.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode>ikke brukes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>klasse fordi ingenting å arve fra.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode>

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the page checks client input.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om siden sjekker klienten inndata.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all validation controls contained on the requested page.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av alle validering Kontroller finnes på den forespurte siden.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to manipulate the methods and properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection> object associated with the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å endre metodene og egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection>tilknyttet gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection>

trans-unit.source: This collection contains all the validation server controls that are contained in a page.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen inneholder alle validering server kontrollene som finnes i en side.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method causes validation logic to be executed for each validation server control in the current validation group.
trans-unit.target: Kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden får validering logic kjøres for hver validering serverkontroll i den gjeldende valideringsgruppen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If any of these controls do not pass, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noen av disse kontrollene ikke består, den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>returnerer `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on validation controls, see [ASP.NET Validation Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon på validering Kontroller [ASP.NET validering Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The collection of validation controls.
trans-unit.target: Samling av validering Kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Confirms that an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"></xref> control is rendered for the specified ASP.NET server control at run time.
trans-unit.target: Bekrefter at en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"> </xref> kontrollen gjengis for den angitte serverkontrollen for ASP.NET ved kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: Controls that are required to be inside `<form runat=server>` tags can call this method before they render so that an error message is shown if they are placed outside the tags.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller som må være i `<form runat=server>` koder kan kalle denne metoden før de gjengi slik at en feilmelding vises hvis de er plassert utenfor kodene.

trans-unit.source: Controls that post back or depend on registered script blocks should call this method in an override of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller som post-tilbake eller er avhengige av registrerte Skriptblokkene må kalle denne metoden i en overstyring av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Pages that have a different way of rendering the server form element can override this method to throw an exception under different conditions.
trans-unit.target: Sider som har en annen måte å gjengis server skjemaelement kan overstyre denne metoden for å iverksette et unntak under forskjellige betingelser.

trans-unit.source: Server controls that post back or use client-side script will not work if they are not enclosed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm> server control (<`form runat="server">`) tags.
trans-unit.target: Serverkontroller poster tilbake, eller bruk skript på klientsiden fungerer ikke hvis de ikke er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm>serverkontroll (`form runat="server">`) koder.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm>

trans-unit.source: These controls can call this method when they render to provide a clear error message when they are not enclosed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm> control.
trans-unit.target: Disse kontrollene kan kalle denne metoden når de gjengi for å levere Tøm feilmelding når de ikke er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm>

trans-unit.source: When you develop a custom server control, it is common to call this method when you override the `Render` method for any kind of input tag.
trans-unit.target: Når du utvikler en egendefinert serverkontroll, er det vanlige vil kalle denne metoden når du overstyre den `Render` metode for alle typer inndatakode.

trans-unit.source: This is particularly important if the input control calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>, or if it emits client script.
trans-unit.target: Dette er spesielt viktig hvis inndata kontrollen kaller <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>, eller hvis den avgir klienten skript</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>

trans-unit.source: A composite server control does not need to make this call.
trans-unit.target: En sammensatt serverkontroll trenger ikke å gjøre dette kallet.

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET server control that is required in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET-serverkontroll som kreves i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The specified server control is not contained between the opening and closing tags of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"></xref> server control at run time.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte serverkontrollen finnes ikke mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"> </xref> serverkontroll på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: The control to verify is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen for å bekrefte er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encryption mode of the view state.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kryptering-modus i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateEncryptionMode property cannot be set in code.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ViewStateEncryptionMode kan ikke angis i koden.

trans-unit.source: It can only be set in the directive or in the < element of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Kan bare angis i direktivet eller i den< element of the configuration file. element="" of="" the="" configuration=""></ element of the configuration file.>

trans-unit.source: Values set in the directive override any values set in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Verdier som er angitt i direktivet overstyringen verdiene som er angitt i konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: The syntax for setting this property in the directive is as follows: ```vb# <%@ Page Language="VB" ViewStateEncryptionMode="Always" %> ``` ```c# <%@ Page Language="C#" ViewStateEncryptionMode="Always" %> ``` The syntax for setting this property in the configuration file is as follows: ```vb# <system.web> <pages viewStateEncryptionMode="Always" /> </system.web> ``` ```c# <system.web> <pages viewStateEncryptionMode="Always" /> </system.web> ``` Custom control developers may wish to check the value of this property in code before saving potentially sensitive data to view state in their control.
trans-unit.target: Syntaksen for å angi denne egenskapen i direktivet er som følger: ```vb# <%@ Page Language="VB" ViewStateEncryptionMode="Always" %> ``` ```c# <%@ Page Language="C#" ViewStateEncryptionMode="Always" %> ``` syntaksen for å angi denne egenskapen i konfigurasjonsfilen er som følger: ```vb# <system.web> <pages viewStateEncryptionMode="Always" /> </system.web> ``` ```c# <system.web> <pages viewStateEncryptionMode="Always" /> </system.web> ``` egendefinert kontrollutviklere kan også kontrollere verdien for denne egenskapen i koden før du lagrer potensielt sensitive data for å vise statusen i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value set is not a member of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien angitt er ikke medlem av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateEncryptionMode property can be set only in or before the page <xref uid="langword_csharp_PreRender" name="PreRender" href=""></xref>phase in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ViewStateEncryptionMode kan angis bare eller før siden <xref uid="langword_csharp_PreRender" name="PreRender" href=""> </xref>fase i livssyklusen til siden.

trans-unit.source: Assigns an identifier to an individual user in the view-state variable associated with the current page.
trans-unit.target: Tilordner en identifikator individuelle brukere i visningsstatusen variabelen knyttet til gjeldende side.

trans-unit.source: Setting the ViewStateUserKey property can help you prevent attacks on your application from malicious users.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen ViewStateUserKey kan hjelpe deg med å hindre angrep på programmet fra onde hensikter.

trans-unit.source: It does this by allowing you to assign an identifier to the view-state variable for individual users so that they cannot use the variable to generate an attack.
trans-unit.target: Det gjøres ved at du kan tilordnes en identifikator visningsstatus variabelen for individuelle brukere slik at de ikke kan bruke variabelen til å generere et angrep.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web attacks and about what you can do to help prevent them, see [Take Advantage of ASP.NET Built-in Features to Fend Off Web Attacks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om Web angrep og hva du kan gjøre for å hindre dem, se [ta nytte av ASP.NET innebygde funksjoner for dataskikk av Web angrep](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557).

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any string value, such as the user's authenticated name or the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.SessionID%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til en strengverdi som brukeren er godkjent navn eller <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.SessionID%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.SessionID%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set this property during the `Page_Init` phase of page processing.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du må sette denne egenskapen i løpet av `Page_Init` fase av behandlingen av siden.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property during the `Page_Load` phase throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen i løpet av `Page_Load` fase oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the individual user.
trans-unit.target: ID for hver enkelt bruker.

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateUserKey property was accessed too late during page processing.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ViewStateUserKey ble åpnet for sent under behandling av siden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref> objektet gjengis.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> is to be rendered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref> skal være gjengitte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
